alert.note: Alert for Hunterdon; Mercer; Middlesex; Northwestern Burlington; Somerset; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 12:42PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Showers with strong winds will impact portions of southeastern Hunterdon, northwestern Camden, Mercer, northwestern Burlington, Somerset, central Monmouth, Middlesex, southeastern Montgomery, southeastern Bucks and Philadelphia Counties through 130 PM EST... At 1241 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers along a line extending from near Martinsville to Washington Crossing to Roxborough. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Philadelphia, Trenton, Camden, New Brunswick, Perth Amboy, Somerville, Gloucester City, Somerset, Edison, Cherry Hill, Old Bridge, Bensalem, East Brunswick, Evesham, Bridgewater, South Brunswick, Sayreville, Mount Laurel, North Brunswick and Manalapan. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 3 and 12. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 344 and 359. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 13 and 40. Interstate 76 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 337 and 351. Interstate 76 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 78 in New Jersey between mile markers 32 and 41. Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 14. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 26 and 76. Interstate 287 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 20, and between mile markers 26 and 27. Interstate 676 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 1. Interstate 676 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 4. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 119 and 133. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hunterdon; Mercer; Middlesex; Northwestern Burlington; Somerset; Western Monmouth
